title: Onion Oil
description: It nourishes your scalp and improves the blood circulation, ensuring thicker and stronger hair growth.
advantages: (-) It is rich in sulfur which prevents breakages, split ends and thinning of the hair.
(-) It also fight lice infestation and dandruff.
(-) It maintains the regular pH of the hair, preventing premature greying.
(-) It can be used as a conditioner before your shampoo,ensuring shiny and healthy hair.
how-to-use: Massage it all over your scalp and length. Keep overnight and rinse it well with good shampoo.
